events.message: I recently purchased a blender from your website, but it is not working properly and I would like to request a refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to product malfunction reported by the customer.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for the defective blender.
Hello! I'm Sarah, here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and more detail about the issue?
Could you please send us pictures of the blender and describe what exactly is not working? This will help us process your refund faster.
I’ve attached photos showing the blender won’t turn on despite being plugged in multiple times. It’s completely broken.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 5-7 business days. Please keep the blender packaged for the return shipment.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate you handling this so promptly and will wait for the refund confirmation.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. You will receive an email confirmation shortly with further instructions regarding the return shipment.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since the refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback is valuable and helps us improve our service.
